Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Room - a room in a text-based game. This class is part of the "Mansion Detective" application. "Mansion Detective" is a text based murder mystery adventure game. A "Room" represents one location in the game. It is connected to other rooms via exits. For each existing exit, the room stores a reference to the neighboring room.
    Version:
    2019.04.15, 2011.08.10
    Author:
    Claire Iroudayassamy, Michael KÃ¶lling and David J. Barnes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String description,
            boolean locked)
        Create a room described "description". Initially, it has no exits, items, or people. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard".
        Parameters:
        description - The room's description.

        public void blocked(boolean blocked)
        Set the blocked status of the room.
        Parameters:

      • getExit

        public Room getExit(java.lang.String direction)
        Return the room that is reached if we go from this room in direction "direction". If there is no room in that direction, return null.
        Parameters:
        direction - The exit's direction.
        Returns:
        The room in the given direction.

      • getItem

        Return a given item if it is in the room.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item
        Returns:
        the item

      • getLongDescription

        public java.lang.String getLongDescription()
        Return a description of the room in the form: You are in the kitchen. People in room: joe - mary Items in room: pen - book Exit: north west
        Returns:
        A long description of this room

      • getLookDescription

        public java.lang.String getLookDescription()
        Return a detailed description of the room. With a list of the items, people, and exits in the room.
        Returns:
        A look description of this room

        public java.lang.String getShortDescription()

        public void unlock()
        Unlock the room. If the room is already unlocked do nothing.

        Change a room's status to visited

      • visited

        public boolean visited()
        Return whether a room has been previously visited by player.
        Returns:
        true if yes, false if player has never been there.
